U.S. House Approves Crypto FIT21 Bill With Wave of Democratic Support https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2024/05/22/us-house-approves-crypto-fit21-bill-with-wave-of-democratic-support/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines Z7EFPRRX7NB77HU35DCKPOOWEU Jesse Hamilton, Nikhilesh DeThe crypto industry recorded its biggest-ever U.S. policy win on Wednesday when the House of Representatives approved a wide-reaching bill to establish regulations for digital assets markets, recording a 279-136 vote that saw Democrats crossing party lines to support it. Wed, 22 May 2024 21:42:02 +0000 2024-05-22T21:48:55.372+00:00 PolicynewsRegulationsHouse of RepresentativesLegislationCongressSECThe U.S. House of Representatives passed its first significant crypto regulation bill.
